description: Baseline P50/P99 latencies for EdgeVec benchmark validation suite (W18.3 v1.2: P99 tracking)

hardware.note: Baselines should be recalibrated per target hardware
hardware.reference: Development machine (to be updated after first CI run)

thresholds.p99_estimation_note: P99 estimated as mean + 5*std_dev (conservative for long-tailed distributions)
thresholds.note: P50: Fail if >110% baseline. P99: Fail if >150% baseline or >5x median (W18.3 v1.2)

insert_1k.description: Insert 1000 vectors (768 dimensions) into HNSW index

search_10k.description: Search k=10 in 10k vector index (768 dimensions)
